title: SAP Demo Data Personalization Add-On Enhances Customer-Focused Demonstrations
summary: SAP has released a new add-on for data personalization in customer-focused demonstrations. This tool aims to provide personalized, real-time demos, improving relevance for sales teams and customers, which could potentially enhance the employee service experience.
hook: SAP's new add-on personalizes customer-focused demos in real-time.

title: MuleSoft gains Agent Scanners to rein in enterprise AI chaos
summary: Salesforce has introduced Agent Scanners to its MuleSoft integration platform, aiming to address the issue of agent sprawl in enterprises. This feature could enhance operational efficiency and governance, making it easier for businesses to scale AI responsibly.
hook: MuleSoft tackles agent sprawl with new Agent Scanners feature

title: ServiceNow will embed OpenAI models into its AI Platform
summary: ServiceNow has signed a multiyear agreement with OpenAI to embed its AI models into its platform, aiming to enhance enterprise AI outcomes and break language barriers. This move could significantly impact ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX buyers by offering more natural interactions and a new class of AI-powered automation.
hook: ServiceNow to embed OpenAI models for enhanced enterprise AI outcomes.

title: GoodData launches MCP server to fuel AI-powered analysis
summary: GoodData has launched a Model Context Protocol server, which allows AI tools to access proprietary data for the development of analytics tools and continuous data analysis. This could simplify the process of building new AI applications for ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX buyers, as it eliminates the need for complex pipeline configurations each time.
hook: GoodData's new server simplifies AI application development.

title: Latest News
summary: Enghouse Interactive, a global provider of customer contact software, offers a complete portfolio of solutions that transform contact centres into growth engines. Their offerings include AI-enabled agent evaluation and a range of deployment options, integrating with industry-leading UC vendors.
hook: Enghouse Interactive's AI-enabled solutions transform contact centres.

title: News
summary: A new tool is injecting real-time budget awareness into agent reasoning loops, aiming to control escalating costs in enterprise technology. This development is significant for ITSM/ITOM/HRSM/ESM/EX buyers as it could help manage costs in mission-critical applications like ERP, CRM, and data platforms which have seen the largest cost increases due to vendor consolidation, consumption-based pricing, and market leverage.
hook: New tool tackles rising enterprise tech costs with real-time budget awareness.

title: Aaron Tan

His experience in covering enterprise technology and technology trends in Singapore and Asia could provide valuable insights for ES buyers in the region.
